isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - INTERNATIONAL 530E I6 HEUI ENGINES - OPERATION - Engine Brake

svcproc.title: Engine Brake
svcproc.para: On vehicles equipped with an exhaust brake the CEC will supply a ground on terminal 47 to activate the exhaust brake solenoid when the brake needs to be activated.
When engine brake on/off switch (434) is on, a ground is sent from G1 ground adapter (453) on circuit 24-G and 24 through connector (190) to CEC connector (379) terminal 15.

When the exhaust brake is to be activated the ECM will supply a ground to exhaust brake solenoid (372) on circuit 24A. The solenoid receives 12 volts on terminal A from fuse F9-A on circuits 23 and 23B.
